name: codenav
description: Token-efficient code navigation for large codebases - reduce token usage by 97%
author: Efren

tools.name: codenav_scan
tools.description: Scan a codebase and generate a structural map with all symbols

tools.name: codenav_search
tools.description: Search for symbols (functions, classes, methods) by name or pattern

tools.name: codenav_read
tools.description: Read specific lines from a file with optional context

tools.name: codenav_get_hubs
tools.description: Identify architectural hub files - the most important files

tools.name: codenav_get_dependencies
tools.description: Get the dependency graph for a file or project

tools.name: codenav_get_structure
tools.description: Get the structure of a specific file showing all symbols

prompts.name: analyze-architecture
prompts.description: Analyze the architecture of a codebase

prompts.name: find-entry-points
prompts.description: Find the main entry points of an application
